# sequelize-compass

## Realtime-generated admin panel for Sequelize ORM

### Dependencies

* Express 3.x/4.x
* Sequelize with mysql/pg driver

### Supported attribute types

* STRING (and TEXT)
* INTEGER
* TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE
* INTEGER[] for PostgreSQL
* BOOLEAN
* ENUM

### Supported association types

* hasMany
* belongsTo
